long_description: Offering an 80-lumen flash to enhance safety during any ride, the Serfas USL-TL80 rear bike light runs for up to 2 hrs. on high and recharges via the nearest USB port. Four light modes include high steady, low steady, flashing and alternating flash (each LED lights up separately). Charge indicator lets you know when battery is running low; simply plug the Serfas USL-TL80 rear bike light into a USB port to recharge via the included cable. Weather-resistant silicone body protects the LEDs; rack compatible; backpack clip included.
short_description: Offering an 80-lumen flash to enhance safety during any ride, the Serfas USL-TL80 rear bike light runs for up to 2 hrs. on high and recharges via the nearest USB port.
